item.description:
In addition to the monthly Lean Startup Meetups at Microsoft NERD, we'll continue to have monthly "Lean Lunch." Lean Lunch is a small gathering of ~10 people just like you that meet at a local restaurant to discuss challenges and solutions to Lean Startup obstacles over lunch. RSVP at: https://wednesdays.com/meetings/info/meetingId:3162

This month's Lean Lunch will be held at Champion's in Kendall Square. We've partnered with our friends at Wednesdays to bring you Lean Lunch every month. To register for the January Lean Lunch, please RSVP at: https://wednesdays.com/meetings/info/meetingId:3162
item.name: January Lean Lunch
